metadata.description: MAG team's curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern full-stack development with LLM performance tracking

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit with TypeScript, React 19, Vite, TanStack Router & Query v5, shadcn/ui. Features code-analysis integration via claudemem semantic search (replaces claude-context MCP), session-based artifact isolation, LLM performance tracking, shadcn/ui component library knowledge (60+ components), multi-model plan/code review (parallel, 3-5x speedup), 13 focused skills, intelligent workflow detection, and Chrome DevTools MCP debugging.

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation using INDEXED MEMORY (claudemem). GREP/FIND FORBIDDEN. Features codebase-detective with explicit TOOL SELECTION RULES (v2.1.0), 7 detective skills with trigger keywords, and code-search-selector decision tree. Prevents grep misuse when semantic search is available.

plugins.name: bun
plugins.description: Production-ready TypeScript backend development with Bun runtime. Includes specialized agents for backend development, API design, and DevOps. Features comprehensive best practices, tools integration (Biome, Prisma, Hono, Docker), testing workflows, and AWS ECS deployment guidance (2025).

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: Shared multi-agent coordination and workflow orchestration patterns for complex Claude Code workflows. Skills-only plugin providing proven patterns for parallel execution (3-5x speedup), dynamic model discovery (claudish --top-models/--free), session-based workspaces, interactive model selection (AskUserQuestion), LLM performance tracking, quality gates, TDD loops, and comprehensive error recovery. Battle-tested patterns from 100+ days production use.

plugins.name: agentdev
plugins.description: Create, implement, and review Claude Code agents and commands with multi-model validation and LLM performance tracking (NEW). Full-cycle development workflow: design (architect) → plan review → implementation (developer) → quality review (reviewer) → iteration. Features parallel external model reviews, quality gates, and comprehensive XML/YAML standards.
